Articles.Content:
I got a idea for a challenge so JUST DO IT

-Shia Labeof Kerman

I got this challenge in my mind what if you made a aircraft duplicate it into 8 and cut them into half attach them into a circle like a octopus and try to take off and land succesfully the damage limit is 5 Parts . if you damage more you lose 

Well thats a crazy idea Dayum im gonna do it now
